what: Gives an idea or spark of inspiration for an activity to do
title: Gives an idea or spark of inspiration for an activity to do
text: goal sparkr generate ideas sparks inspiration things get bored. Ideas predefined, chosen randomly enjoyment. Never get bored sparkr. sparkr used simply typing following: Categories can Physical, Social, Creative, Wellness, Bad. Category required package work. sparkr comes preexisting dataset includes idea data catagoeires.
code: sparkr(give_idea = TRUE) sparkr(give_idea = FALSE) sparkr(give_idea = TRUE, category = NULL)

title: Gives an idea or spark of inspiration for an activity to do
text: can install development version sparkr like :
code: install.packages("devtools") install.packages("usethis") library(devtools) library(usethis)  install_github("liamthepineapple/sparkr") library(sparkr)

title: sparkr: Gives an idea or spark of inspiration for an activity to do — sparkr-package
text: Maintainer: Liam Surry surryl@mcmaster.ca (ORCID) Liam Surry, Department Chemistry Chemical Biology surryl@mcmaster.ca

title: #' Give a random idea or
text: give_idea Logical. Set TRUE get randomly selected idea something . category optional category filter ideas (e.g., Physical, Wellness, Creative, Social, Bad).

title: #' Give a random idea or
text: random idea predefined list activities message idea selected.

title: #' Give a random idea or
code: sparkr(TRUE)              # Get a random idea #> [1] "\"Appreciate everything around you\"" sparkr(give_idea = TRUE) # Get a random idea #> [1] "\"Stick you hands in a wasp nest\"" sparkr(give_idea = FALSE) # Responds without providing an idea #> [1] "Oh you came up with an idea all by yourself? Nice free will"
